post.title: Pusblish Gatsby with Github Actions
post.description: Since you've taken the time to get your Github Pages site setup with Gatsby, you should probably add automated publishing next.  With the help of Github Workflows and Gatsby Publish Action it takes seconds (or a few minutes tops).
